product_name: DeLorme Virginia Atlas and Gazetteer - 4th Edition
long_description: Features 63 detailed maps of the entire state of Virginia, including GPS grids, recreation sites and back roads. Detailed topographical maps use a scale of 1:150,000. Information on art museums, science centers, outdoor recreation, historic sites, parks, scenic drives, waterfalls, wildlife, wineries and more. Delorme Publishing; copyright 2000.
short_description: Features 63 detailed maps of the entire state of Virginia, including GPS grids, recreation sites and back roads.
